title: Why do OCE events run off NA times? WHERE IS URF!?
body: I'd understand delaying OCE if all the servers had cross server play active, but that not being the case, why is it that we have to wait till the 28th american time to get access to ARURF?

replies.body:
Because their based in America and don't give a shit about their other audiences. They used to release game modes to servers based on time zones. Now we had to wait till the 28th to be told the game is being released 3am on the 29th for OCE. Bloody Ridiculous...

https://twitter.com/Mortdog/status/1089553635082567680

> [{quoted}](name=Charastiel,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gFiKXspk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-28T01:43:36.372+0000)
>
> Because their based in America and don't give a shit about their other audiences. They used to release game modes to servers based on time zones. Now we had to wait till the 28th to be told the game is being released 3am on the 29th for OCE. Bloody Ridiculous...
> 
> https://twitter.com/Mortdog/status/1089553635082567680

Korean servers get it in there time. Not NA. Also I guess they release it in NA time for china.

Why isn't it on now tho, isn't it 28th January in America???

and now i will start school in like 2 days and have to focus on studies and cant play it wtf riot
